channel.title: Greta Lee on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Greta Lee on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Venice Hidden Gem: Willem Dafoe Is a Poetic Postal Worker in ‘Late Fame’
item.description: A chance flight brought director Kent Jones and Willem Dafoe together and revealed they were chasing the same obscure story: “[Dafoe] had a copy of the novella in his backpack, which is just crazy.”

item.title: Venice Hidden Gem: Willem Dafoe Is a Poetic Postal Worker in ‘Late Fame’
item.description: A chance flight brought director Kent Jones and Willem Dafoe together and revealed they were chasing the same obscure story: “[Dafoe] had a copy of the novella in his backpack, which is just crazy.”

item.title: ‘The Morning Show’ Heads Into a Risky “Reset” in Steamy Season 4 Trailer
item.description: There’s lots of tension — professional and otherwise — in the latest preview for the Apple series starring Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon, which is set to return Sept. 17.

item.title: ‘The Morning Show’ Heads Into a Risky “Reset” in Steamy Season 4 Trailer
item.description: There’s lots of tension — professional and otherwise — in the latest preview for the Apple series starring Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon, which is set to return Sept. 17.

item.title: “I Didn’t Want to Offend Him as a Thespo”: Jeff Bridges Talks Working With Method Actor Jared Leto on ‘Tron: Ares’
item.description: Lasers, Nine Inch Nails and light cycles all dominated during the film’s Comic-Con debut.
